programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: The most inspiring health stories of Season 5! Meet the “Couple of the Year” and see why people compare them to “The Notebook.” Plus, the Lifetime Achievement Award, Best Supporting Spouse, Nurse of the Year, the Viewer’s Choice Award and much more!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: People know that smoking causes cancer and continue to puff anyway, but could you be doing something you didn’t know was bad for you? The Doctors reveals some of the health mistakes you never knew you were making.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: The Best and Worst for Your Body
programme.desc: Some tenets of good health are undisputable: vegetables are good for you, smoking is not. But some are not as obvious. The Doctors reveal the best and worst things you can do for your body.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Embarrassed by a family member? From Dad’s dancing to your cousin’s crazy clothes, learn how to combat your relative’s kookiest quirks! And, Dancing with the Stars’ Louis Van Amstel’s dance tips.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Bothered by bad-smelling belches? Problem with pinworms? Get answers to the questions that make you go, “What the yuck?!” And, The Doctors’ Motherhood Survival Club tackles the biggest issues modern moms face.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: It’s The Doctors’ Fans’ Favorites special - from the stories that broke your heart to the stories that broke the internet, we’re delivering ten years of our most memorable moments! A mother loses her hearing and spends fifteen years in silence until cochlear implant surgery. Our cameras were with her in the operating room and The unforgettable moment when she heard her son’s voice for the first time. See how they’re doing now! Remember the 685-pound teen with the voice of angel? Find out if he’s lost weight! Don’t miss the biggest transformations and the most-watched clip in The Doctors history!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: What Every Woman is Afraid to Ask
programme.desc: The Doctors answer the questions you’re too embarrassed to talk about – even with your best friend! Find out how to improve your love life, eliminate body odor and more!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Are you your own worst critic? From sweaty armpits to thick ankles, see new solutions for your most “embarrassing” body problems. And, get simple, at-home remedies for brittle nails.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Three years ago, Thomas Beatie made headlines as the first legal man in history to give birth. After years under the radar, The Doctors uncover everything you didn’t know about the controversial pregnancy and delivery.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: In a The Doctors exclusive, a Teen Mom star who thinks she was misdiagnosed with a mental health disorder comes to the show for a second opinion! Plus, the shocking story of a baby born with two noses! Then, Dr. Pimple Popper returns to discuss two gross viral videos: the “grandmother of all blackheads” and a popped blister you have to see to believe! And can you be too fat for fitness? A fitness teacher called out for her weight is here to set the record straight!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: A previous guest who was addicted to exercise and referred to as the “sickest person ever on The show” returns with an unexpected update. Then, can cold medicine be used as a murder defense? The Doctors discusses the much buzzed about court case. Plus, our Stool Squad spins The “Wheel of Poop” and answers all your questions about… “Number Two”! And, The Doctors tackles the new research that points to the root cause of ADHD being sleep issues?

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors uncover the best treatments for your worst body conditions. Clear uncontrollable acne and treat embarrassing scars. Plus, a disintegrating teeth disorder and a debilitating problem “down there.” Are you at risk?

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Ask Our Docs: Where, When and Why
programme.desc: From when your child should start talking to why hormones affect your mood, The Doctors tackles your biggest who, what, where, when and why questions. And, get the most effective home remedies from around the globe.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors’ Exclusive: Carmen Tarleton first appeared on The Doctors after surviving a brutal attack that left her face severely disfigured. Now, after a 15-hour face transplant, she reveals her amazing transformation to the world!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Woman addicted to eating uncooked pasta for 30 years writes in to THE DOCTORS to save her life! Could her obsession with macaroni noodles be cured? Then, a body builder dies … from a protein overdose? And, why the internet has everyone cringing over the callus removal videos? Plus, could the hormones in fast food be to blame for one boy’s “A” cup breast? THE DOCTORS discusses the startling links between hormones and your health. And, caught on tape: a crazy calf cramp that seems to have a mind of its own! Then, see what happens when the “Yum Yuck Crew” kids give their critiques on avocado ice cream … will they like it? And, breast surgeon Dr. Kristi Funk gives you the “Breast Case Scenario” on your most embarrassing nipple issues.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Do you suffer from migraine headaches? Learn about one surprising cure for your throbbing head! And, getting cavities filled used to be a painful process. Learn about a new, painless procedure that fixes your cavities.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Is professional honey trapping a good idea? The bride who had a detox drink disaster! Can kimchi be a cure for baldness? Mystery behind exploding nail polish remover! Visit to nail salon sends woman to E.R.! Can expired sunscreen cause burns? Shocking pictures: man with a golf ball sized growth on his head! Can you get sepsis from blisters? Meet the company founders who embrace integrative work lives! Should you go furniture-free for your health? Find out which apples to eat for a longer life!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: In a daytime exclusive, Hollywood legend Valerie Harper, perhaps best known for her iconic role as Rhoda on The Mary Tyler Moore Show, sits down with The Doctors in her first television interview since announcing she's been diagnosed with terminal brain cancer.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Feeling tired and worn down? The Doctors reveal the top four reasons you may feel fatigued -- and none are lack of sleep! Plus, take 10 years off your face without a scalpel or filler! Could it work for you?

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Whether it’s puberty, menopause or old age, learn how to stay healthy at every age. Plus, get the ultimate guide to treating adolescent acne, and learn how to help your baby take his or first steps!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: From backaches, to headaches to earaches, learn simple solutions to relieve nagging aches and pains. And, learn a unique and effective way to treat colicky babies.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Are you prepared for life’s imminent health obstacles? Learn to manage infertility, how to respond when someone faints and discover the silent killer that takes more lives than breast cancer and AIDS combined.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: It’s a dramatic, jaw-dropping, not-to-be-missed episode of The Doctors! Meet amazing people with record-breaking talents and learn their mind-boggling health secrets. Plus, want to have more orgasms? Find out how from a woman who’s had more than 80 thousand!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors explores a community project aimed at healing the sick – with food! A new discovery could mean a cure for alcoholism? A young mom begins losing her vision after pregnancy? Beauty blogger recommends DIY lightening down there? A dad forced to change his daughter’s diaper on a dirty restaurant bathroom floor – and you won’t believe the photo!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors teach you how to improve your health sunup to sundown! Find out how to eliminate not-so-fresh morning breath, avoid frustrating razor bumps and make sleepless nights a thing of the past.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: At the doctor’s office, sometimes the waiting is the hardest part. Get the information you need to know to relieve the anxiety before your next appointment.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: One of the biggest thrills of parenting is learning that your child has a big heart. But one of the biggest terrors is learning your child has a defective heart. Special guest Dr. Gregory Fontana is one of the leading pediatric heart surgeons in the country.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: A woman overcomes bulimia, but sees the toll on her teeth. Now she’s so ashamed of her smile, she rarely leaves her home. Can THE DOCTORS help? A domestic violence survivor gets a life-changing surgery! A first date fail leads to a bill? A couple faces charges after using a drone to spy into their neighbors’ homes? The Krazy Coupon Lady reveals money-saving secrets to outsmart retailers! Could yoga be the therapy you need? Find out! Plus, a new app designed to catch distracted drivers in the act!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: A new “natural” filler is revealed LIVE on the show! A woman discovers her home has become a beehive and turns to THE DOCTORS for help! Would you choose to stay pregnant for 5 years to avoid maternity leave? THE DOCTORS tackles paid maternity leave. In a THE DOCTORS exclusive, a mom raises awareness about the rare disease turning her daughter into a “hulk baby” … and THE DOCTORS surprises her in ways she never saw coming! Climate control bedding is put to the test! And, are your kids at risk for kitchen burns? Are you making cleaning mistakes that could make you sick? Get the facts!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Precocious puberty affects girls as young as 5 years of age. Find out what changes to watch for in your daughters. And, always wanted to have a nose job, but afraid to go under the knife? See Dr. Ordon's no-surgery nose job!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: It’s a shocking investigation that will change your eating habits forever: The Doctors and celebrity chef Rocco DiSpirito reveal what’s really in your food. Plus, the top seven foods that fight fat and make your stomach flat!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Editor-in-chief of Prevention, Liz Vaccariello, joins The Doctors to share the 50 health dos and don’ts everyone needs to know! And, find out which heart-healthy activity can add years to your life, without even getting out of bed.
